text: Mother Mary Angelica of the Annunciation (Rita Antoinette Rizzo; April 20, 1923 - March 27, 2016) was an American Catholic nun. She created the Eternal Word Television Network (ETWN). It is a very popular television channel for Catholics. Mother Angelica died on March 27, 2016, Easter Sunday, from complications of a stroke at her home in Hanceville, Alabama, aged 92. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American television personalities Category:American Roman Catholic nuns
title: Mother Angelica
